mapper.select: SELECT C.*,E.ENTNAME,M.USERNAME,M.ALIASNAME,R.CREATEUSER_NAME,R.RESULTREMARK,R.CREATETIME,(SELECT NAME FROM SYS_DICTIONARIES D WHERE D.ZD_ID=C.TYPE_ID) TYPE_NAME FROM BL_COMPLAINT C LEFT JOIN BL_RESPONDED R ON C.ID = R.RELATION_ID LEFT JOIN BL_ENTERADDITIONINFO E ON C.PRIPID = E.PRIPID LEFT JOIN BL_MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_ID = M.ID where c.ID = #{id}
